short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add country flags to the language selection in Google Translate

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds an icon to some languages with the flag of the origin country in that language. Despite not being the best practice, it can improve usability.

After installing the extension, you just have to open Google Translate in translate.google.com language selection by clicking in the down arrow.

Changelog:

1.0.1: Patch to new CSS selectors after Material Design redesign in Google Translate.

1.0.2: Update to Web Extension manifest v3
